Nili Lotan is an Israeli-born and New York-based fashion designer. Nili moved to NYC in 1980 to pursue a career in fashion design, where she enjoyed a very successful career leading design teams at top American fashion houses including Ralph Lauren, Liz Claiborne, and Nautica.

After stints at several major American sportswear brands, Israeli-born, New York-based designer Nili Lotan branched off on her own. Her eponymous label quickly gained steam for its selection of pared-down essentials that transcend trends, but still feel effortlessly modern.
